resources.string: This app needs permission to use this feature. You can grant them in app settings.

Conditions: 
 1. Duration no more than 5 minutes.
 2. 30 days after delivery - the video will be deleted automatically.
 3. Video recording only vertically.

Prices:
 1. up to 2 months - 0.99 $
 2. 2 - 6 months - 2.99 $
 3. 6 - 1 years - 4.99 $
 4. 1 - 3 years - 19.99 $
 5. 3 - 10 years - 49.99 $
 6. 10-20 years - 99.99 $
 7. 20-100 years - 199.99 $
